#summary Overview of what will be needed for ePub 3 support

= Introduction =

The upcoming ePub 3 standard will be a broad overhaul of ePub, and will add a lot of important features to ePub, including support for HTML5 and CSS3, better support for multilingual documents, etc.

A draft release is here: [http://idpf.org/epub/30 ePub 3.0 Draft].

More details on the [http://code.google.com/p/epub-revision/ epub-revision project page].

= Things to do =

Many of the things to-do can be aligned with over-all support for HTML5/CSS3. Specific for ePub3 are:

  * NCX replacement for [http://idpf.org/epub/30/spec/epub30-contentdocs.html#sec-xhtml-nav EPUB Navigation Documents]
  * Page-lists
  * Improved meta-data.
    * See [http://idpf.org/epub/30/spec/epub30-publications.html#sec-package-metadata-dcmi-transition Metadata transition].
